<title level="2" right="Creature 8">[Scarlet Triad Poisoner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1554)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 41</row>

**Perception** +16

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Gnoll](/Languages.aspx?ID=17)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +18, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +15, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +16, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[addlebrain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=504) (2 doses), [expanded alchemist's tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2), [greater antidote](/Equipment.aspx?ID=80), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=67)_ (10 bolts poisoned with [giant scorpion venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=114)), [keys to manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [good manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32) (marked with the symbol of the Scarlet Triad), _+1 [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 27 

**Fort** +17 

**Ref** +18 

**Will** +14 

+1 status to all saves vs. [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)
</row>

**HP** 135

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +19 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+10 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
crossbow +19 ([range increment 120](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus [giant scorpion venom](/Equipment.aspx?ID=114)

**Running Poison Strike** <actions string="Two Actions" />  **Frequency** three times per day; **Effect** The poisoner Strides, poisoning their weapon as they move. The poisoner moves up to their Speed and makes a melee Strike that deals 2d8 extra poison damage. This has no effect on a Strike that already deals poison damage.

</column>
name: Scarlet Triad Poisoner
